name: Bismarck (KanColle)
description:
More preview on my Pixiv: 4BEraser - pixiv

How to use:

You can input nothing to generate the character any way, but I do recommend you to use following prompts to generate the outfit:

  • Base: Bismarck /(Kancolle/),blonde hair, blue eyes, large breasts

  • Outfit: military uniform, military hat, peaked cap, hat ornament, bare shoulders, black panties, thighhighs, detached sleeves ,brown gloves,iron cross, anchor, grey thighhighs, long sleeves,

  • Try other tags by your own, this has a wide variety of possible clothings. If the official element keep popping up, put those in negative prompts.

  • It seems being hard to remove armor in wide pics, but you can try these out in negative prompts: (BSMArmor, gun, turret, canon, machinery:1.4)

    • NSFW compatible, sort of.

    • If you find out that it's focusing on chara's feet, you can try to use Controlnet to limit it.

    • capable to most anime model & lora but won't be good on Counterfeit. Suggest AOM3 for similar result.

Settings are what I am using, you can change by your own.

  • DPM++ Series(SDE Karras, 2M Karras, etc.)

  • about 20 steps, CFG scale 5~7

  • LoRA Weight: above 0.6, try it by your own

  • If using highres

    • ESRGAN_4X

    • Denoising 0.5-0.6.

    • LoRA Train Info

      • based on Animefull-pruned

      • batch 3

      • loss: 0.0866

        • 2x other outfits 65 images

        • 8x official outfits 77 images

        • 8x official outfits with 66 images

        • => 1 epoch = 1274 images
